results.title: Mitochondrial encephalopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes diagnosed after metformin-triggered stroke-like episodes.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538525 @@@Mitochondrial encephalopathy@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, and @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@-like episodes diagnosed after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-triggered @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@-like episodes.

citations.NLM: Murakami K, Sakamoto K, Ishiguchi H, Ito H. Mitochondrial encephalopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes diagnosed after metformin-triggered stroke-like episodes. J Stroke Cerebrovasc Dis. 2023 May;32(5):107080. PMID: 36933522

results.title: Metformin delays neurological symptom onset in a mouse model of neuronal complex I deficiency
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ delays onset of @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538525 @@@mitochondrial encephalopathy@@@ in a CNS model of @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation defect@@@.

citations.NLM: Peralta S, Pinto M, Arguello T, Garcia S, Diaz F, Moraes CT. Metformin delays neurological symptom onset in a mouse model of neuronal complex I deficiency JCI Insight. 2020 Nov 5;5(21):. PMID: 33148885
